sentences.sContent: Seismic callosity , love immensity greatly, hope this vivid kinetic energy helps the people of disaster area.

sentences.sContent: Saw your reality, pouring into apartness of callosity , concealing in the unanimated eyes, inhabiting the senseless.

sentences.sCn: 看见你的现实，倾泻于无情的冷漠，掩藏在无瞳的双眼，占据着无谓的灵魂。

sentences.sContent: Seismic callosity ground each fresh life put an end to at Acheron , how many family to destroy?
